notes.text: Security update for the Linux Kernel (Live Patch 18 for SLE 12 SP2)
notes.title: Title of the patch

notes.text:
This update for the Linux Kernel 4.4.114-92_64 fixes one issue.

The following security issue was fixed:

- CVE-2018-5848: Fixed an unsigned integer overflow in wmi_set_ie. This could lead to a buffer overflow (bsc#1097356).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: CSAF 2.0 data is provided by SUSE under the Creative Commons License 4.0 with Attribution (CC-BY-4.0).
notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: In the function wmi_set_ie(), the length validation code does not handle unsigned integer overflow properly. As a result, a large value of the 'ie_len' argument can cause a buffer overflow in all Android releases from CAF (Android for MSM, Firefox OS for MSM, QRD Android) using the Linux Kernel.
notes.title: CVE description
